markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Aberration Kinship](/Feats.aspx?ID=2516) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fleshwarp" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=338" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 92 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your mind resonates with the inscrutable thought processes that inhuman aberrations use to communicate. You can cast [_mindlink_](/Spells.aspx?ID=195) as an innate occult spell once per day, but you can target only [aberrations](/Traits.aspx?ID=1).
name: Aberration Kinship
